src:
Gol Cristiano Ronaldo Dicuri Aaron Ramsey, Netizen Berikan Respon Menggelitik
07 Nov 2019, 23:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kasus pencurian gol Cristiano Ronaldo oleh Aaron Ramsey di laga Lokomotiv Moscow vs Juventus membuat netizen mengunggah sejumlah meme yang menggelitik.
Cristiano Ronaldo gagal mencetak gol melalui tendangan bebas saat Juventus mengalahkan Lokomotiv Moscow dengan skor 1-2 dalam lanjutan matcday 4 Liga Champions 2019-2020, Kamis (7/11/2019) di Lokomotiv Stadium. Dua gol kemenangan Nyonya Tua dicetak Aaron Ramsey pada menit ketiga dan Douglas Costa pada menit 90+3.
Bianconeri langsung unggul cepat pada menit ketiga melalui gol Aaron Ramsey. Ia mencocor bola hasil tendangan bebas Cristiano Ronaldo.
Tendangan bebas eks pemain Real Madrid itu gagal ditangkap kiper Lokomotiv, Guilherme dan bola meluncur melalui kakinya menuju gawang. Saat bola akan melewati garis gawang, Aaron Ramsey langsung menendang bola tersebut ke gawang.
Padahal, jika Ramsey tak menyambar dan bola masuk ke gawang, Cristiano Ronaldo akan mencetak gol pertamanya melalui tendangan bebas di Juventus. Momen tersebut lantas langsung ramai di media sosial karena Ramsey dianggap mencuri gol Ronaldo.
Hal ini langsung direspon oleh netizen di dunia maya dengan menggunggah banyak meme menggelitik. Seperti apa meme-meme itu? Simak di bawah ini.
text:
Cristiano Ronaldo Goal Stolen by Aaron Ramsey, Netizens Give Tickling Responses
Nov 7 2019, 23:50 by Bola.net
Soccer - The goal theft of Cristiano Ronaldo by Aaron Ramsey in the Lokomotiv Moscow vs Juventus match made netizens upload a number of tickling memes.
Cristiano Ronaldo failed to score with a free kick when Juventus defeated Lokomotiv Moscow with a score of 1-2 in the continued matcday 4 of the 2019-2020 Champions League on Thursday (11/07/2019) at Lokomotiv Stadium. Two Old Lady victory goals printed Aaron Ramsey in the third minute and Douglas Costa in the 90 + 3 minute.
The Bianconeri immediately excelled quickly in the third minute through Aaron Ramsey's goal. He struck the ball from Cristiano Ronaldo's free kick.
The former Real Madrid player's free kick failed to be caught by goalkeeper Lokomotiv, Guilherme and the ball rolled through his feet toward the goal. When the ball will cross the goal line, Aaron Ramsey immediately kicks the ball into the goal.
In fact, if Ramsey does not grab and the ball into the goal, Cristiano Ronaldo will score his first goal through a free kick at Juventus. The moment then immediately crowded on social media because Ramsey considered stealing Ronaldo's goal.
This was immediately responded by netizens in cyberspace by uploading lots of tickling memes. What are the memes like? See below.
